name: Phantosaur
description:
A Zombasaur apocalypse is happening in Downoland, survive it by moving your soul from body to body while avoiding your end.

Controls: 

Space to Jump/ Sweep down (In ghost form)

This is my first ever game jam, so I am taking advantage of it to learn all the rules of unity and game development, hopefully it is fun and enjoyable enough for a couple of you guys to enjoy.
